nodes.text: Echo Eight was the callsign given to a pilot in Echo Flight, a N-X Police Cruisers squadron in the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps.
At the age of 16, Keela Egast served as Echo Eight prior to the Invasion of Naboo. Her starfighter had been shot down by Dren Melne during the Battle at TFP-9 in 33 BBY.
